note:
This BookWyrm account is dedicated to sharing the Buddhist teachings found in the#suttas of the Pali Canon preserved by the Theravada tradition. The main website, https://ReadingFaithfully.org has lots of tips and tricks for reading the suttas as well as free ebooks of suttas. https://Daily.ReadingFaithfully.org website can send a selection from the suttas to your inbox or other social platforms, including on Mastodon.

BookWyrm is an open source, federated social book network similar to GoodReads. But not owned by Amazon. ;-)
